title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same features as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chat, completion, and embeddings pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI wrapper that adds chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates to the ollama command.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models (macOS/Linux/Windows).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama supporting streaming, embeddings, and custom options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or scripts.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Dockerfiles and compose examples for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chat interface using the Ollama REST API; one-click Vercel deploy.

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry of community-contributed Modelfile definitions for CodeLlama, Zephyr, Vicuna, etc.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Experimental CLI that replicates OpenAI Codex flow using Ollama CodeLlama models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app with session memory, model selector, and token-speed metrics.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio, serde, and streaming support.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings Ollama models to any server via slash commands.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async/await, streaming, and dependency-injection helpers.
